docs.title: Guidlines
docs.text: "What I cannot create, I do not understand." -- Richard Feynman

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: This blog primarily serves to enhance my understanding of learning and act as a reference when I forget. I would be delighted if my blog also proves helpful to you.

docs.title: Requirement
docs.text:
1. Academic Integrity
  2. No tedious notes & organization
  3. Creativity & thoughtful & original
  4. Don`t just raise a question, try to solve it
  5. Focus on the problem and no bullshit
